resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/105901</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>105901</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770205381</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">The Grey Eminences: David Ireland</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Grauen Würden: David Irland</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Éminences Grises : David Irlande</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os Eminences Cinzentos: David Ireland</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Eminenze Grige: David Irlanda</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τα γκρίζα υψώματα: Δαβίδ Ιρλανδία</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Las Eminencias Grises: David Irlanda</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">SPARK is at the Oakland Museum of California as they work with acclaimed artist David Ireland to create an innovative exhibit and retrospective of his 30-year career. This Educator Guide explores the history of Conceptual art and Ireland's contributions.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <coverage>
            <string language="en">North America</string>
          </coverage>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">FUNKEN ist am Oakland Museum von Kalifornien, 
während sie mit mit Beifall begrüßtem Künstler David Irland 
arbeiten, um eine erfinderische Ausstellung zu erstellen und 
zurückblickend von seiner 30-Jahrekarriere. Diese 
Erzieher-Anleitung erforscht die Geschichte der Begriffskunst und der 
Beiträge Irlands.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'ÉTINCELLE est au musée d'Oakland de la 
Californie pendant qu'elles travaillent avec l'artiste acclamé David 
Irlande pour créer un objet exposé innovateur et rétrospectif de sa
carrière 30-year. Ce guide d'éducateur explore l'histoire de 
l'art conceptuel et des contributions de l'Irlande.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A FAÍSCA está no museu de Oakland de Califórnia
enquanto trabalham com artista aclamado David Ireland para criar uma 
exibição inovativa e retrospective de sua carreira 30-year. 
Esta guia do educador explora o history da arte conceptual e das
contribuições de Ireland.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La SCINTILLA è al museo de Oakland della 
California mentre funzionano con l'artista applaudito David Irlanda 
per creare un'esposizione innovatrice e retrospettivo della sua 
carriera 30-year. Questa guida dell'educatore esplora la storia 
dell'arte concettuale e dei contributi dell'Irlanda.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο ΣΠΙΝΘΗΡΑΣ είναι στο μουσείο του Όουκλαντ Καλιφόρνιας
όπως λειτουργούν με τον επευφημημένο καλλιτέχνη Δαβίδ Ιρλανδία 
για να δημιουργήσουν ένα καινοτόμες έκθεμα και μια ρετροσπεκτίβα 
της σταδιοδρομίας 30-έτους του. Αυτός ο οδηγός 
εκπαιδευτικών ερευνά την ιστορία των εννοιολογικών συνεισφορών 
τέχνης και της Ιρλανδίας.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La CHISPA está en el museo de Oakland de 
California mientras que trabajan con el artista aclamado David Irlanda
para crear un objeto expuesto innovador y retrospectivo de su carrera 
30-year. Esta guía del educador explora la historia del arte 
conceptual y de las contribuciones de Irlanda.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Künste</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Arti</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τέχνες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770205381</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0

FN:OERCommons

END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial-Share Alike 2.5</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>105901</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/the-grey-eminences-david-ireland</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
